item.title: Tarmakk
item.description: #tarm { list-style-type: disc !important; } Project Requirements Keep Company colors design Simplify user workflow Organize datas & features accessibility Full web integrated app Responsive Design prototype APIs binded actions CRUD integration by click actions Project Details Tarmakk is my first real big project I had to realize.

item.title: Goldorak
item.description: #gold { list-style-type: disc !important; } Project Requirements Full web integrated app Responsive Design prototype APIs binded actions CRUD integration by click actions Design identity Complex knowledge on UNIX system Project Details Working on Goldorak was really fun!
